page.title: 02SCHOOL TIMETABLE
page.content:
{A TYPICAL SCHOOL TIMETABLE AT {KINGSBURY MIDDLE SCHOOL 1985/86 { (Class FIVE Friday) 8.55 REGISTRATION 9.00 ASSEMBLY 9.25 MATHEMATICS 10.25 CRISP TIME{(Eating Crisps etc) 10.30 PLAYTIME 10.40 SCIENCE/TOPIC{(Half Class) 11.40 READING TIME 12.00 LUNCH BREAK 13.10 AFTERNOON REGISTRATION 13.15 P.E.(Physical Education) 13.45 MUSIC 14.15 PLAYTIME 14.30 ENGLISH 15.20 STORY{(Teacher Reads Aloud)} 15.30 END OF SCHOOL DAY
{* TOPIC =}INTEGRATED STUDIES ** FRENCH is also included in other day's timetable.
